description:
We are the Early Adopter$.

To celebrate the Soonaverse launch, this award will give the first 50 early adopters a whitelist to our first free NFT drop. Sign up for the award, follow us on Twitter and DM us a photo of your badge together with your Twitter username to be whitelisted for the drop.

We are still in the early stages, but it's a long time since 2017, so you are probably used to waiting...
name: Early Adopter$Â NFT - Free Drop Whitelist
